name: amqp-test-fixture-runner
description: A system that connects to an ActiveMQ instance and runs test fixtures

scripts.test: docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yml up -d && AMQP_URL=amqp://producer:DYjpp4fbCQ8zpiDIoJwP@localhost FIXTURE_DIRECTORIES=./test node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout 60000 && docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yml down

author: Fredrik Söderström <fredrik.soderstrom@mojlighetsministeriet.se>
